description: Enables alternative client authentication methods for the specified directory.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the specified directory.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of client authentication to enable. Currently only the value SmartCard is supported. Smart card authentication in AD Connector requires that you enable Kerberos Constrained Delegation for the Service User to the LDAP service in your self-managed AD.
